name: Colour-Man
description:
Made for GMTK 2019 Game Jam in 48 hours. Didn't have time to fix every bug so it has some bugs. If you ever happen to stuck, just press Tab to restart. 

Every asset made by me.

How to play? 

A and D for movement
Spacebar for jump
Shift for run
1-2-3-4 for selecting colours and Q for activating them for 5 seconds. You can use only one colour at a time so chose wisely. After 5 seconds you can change the colour.
Tab to restart level.
